thread.section_title: Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful quaint hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful quaint hotel - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kevin C
title: Beautiful quaint hotel
text:
This was a hotel type that I am not used to. I usually stay at a large chain with restaurants and an executive lounge. I really liked my stay here. The building is beautiful. Very convenient and close walk to the Metro and plenty of restaurants in the neighborhood.
I had a suite on 6 and the room was awesome. The décor made you feel like you were in Paris, the wallpaper and linens.
The elevator was not that great though. I did not mind. I took the winding staircase that wrapped around the elevator ever time.
Room Tip: Try to get a suite since the rooms tend to be small. See more room tips
